settings.editor.fontFamily: 'FiraCode NF', 'firaCode Nerd Font', 'JetBrains Mono', 'Cascadia Code', Consolas, 'Courier New', monospace
settings.markdown.preview.fontFamily: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe WPC', 'Segoe UI', system-ui, 'Ubuntu', 'Droid Sans', sans-serif
settings.C_Cpp.clang_format_style: { BasedOnStyle: Google, IndentWidth: 2, ColumnLimit: 100, NamespaceIndentation: All }
